Galian Pilar Kereta Cepat Bisa Mempengaruhi Sistem Hidrologi Bandung Raya
06 Nov 2019, 05:13 by Novianti Nurulliah
BANDUNG, (PR).- Galian pilar Kereta Cepat Jakarta Bandung di sekitar Bandung raya akan mempengaruhi sistem hidrologi jika pilar ada di badan sungai. Selebihnya, jika pembangunan pilar tidak dilakukan di badan sungai, hal itu tidak akan berpengaruh apapun terkait dengan potensi banjir atau  luas tidaknya kemungkinan genangan yang terjadi. 
Kabid Pelaksanaan Sumber Air (PJSA)BBWS Citarum Suwarno menuturkan, pembangunan jalur KCJB di Bandung Raya memang melintasi dua anak sungai Citarum di Cimahi. Kedua sungai tersebut yaitu Cigondewah dan Cisangkan. Selain itu ada juga saluran drainase yang tertimbun. Pihaknya sudah didatangi pihak KCIC, mereka meminta rekomendasi teknis terkait penggalian pilar di dua sungai dan terkait drainase tersebut. 
"Memang di lapangan ada galian-galiang yang belum rapi, jalur drainase masih ketimbun, saya sudah minta kepelaksana KCIC agar segera merapikan karena sekarang sudah musim hujan, supaya banjir tidak menggenang ke arah sebelah utara tol Padaleunyi," kata Suwarno yang dihubungi "PR", Rabu, 6 November 2019. 
Menurut dia, pihak KCIC dalam hal ini sebagai pelaksanaan proyek KCJB harus memindahkan aliran sungai sehingga jamur air tidak terganggu karena adanya timbunan tanah yang menghambat jalannya air. 
"Mereka kemarin Kamis minta saran teknis, rekomendasi dari BBWS, soal syaratnya bagaimana. Dan untuk pengalihan jalur sungai dan peralihan drainase kami minta segera. Di lapangan ada bagian-bagian yang sudah dilaksanakan tapi tidak ganggu (jalan air). Tapi soal drainase yang tertutup saya minta dibersihkan dan dinormalisasi agar tidak ada genangan," kata dia. 
Selain Cimahi, kata dia, jalur KCJB pun melintasi kawasan Gedebage namun tidak mengganggu sungai, akan ada jembatan di sana. 
Selebihnya, terkait dengan progres proyek infrastruktur penanganan banjir Bandung Raya, BBWS mengklaim sudah banyak perkembangan di lapangan. Di antaranya pembangunan tunel atau terowongan Nanjung, penanganan Citarum Hulu yang meliputi normalisasi Cikeruh, Cimande, Cikijing, floodway atau sodetan serta kolam retensi. 
"Tunel Nanjung sudah 92 persen, akhir November selesai. Pengecoran di tunel sudah 40 meter dari 230 meter. Ya  satu udah 230 meter. Kami sudah selesai melapisi terowongan," kata dia.  
Kemudian di outlet pada bagian sedimen trap yang pertama bagian tebing sebelah kanan sama lantainya sudah selesai. 
"Lubang pintunya  sudah ya tinggal pintu jembatan udah dicor. Jalan akses juga sudah, ya perapihan-perapihan. Mudah-mudahan November selesai, " kata dia. 
Untuk floodway atau sodetan, diakui dia sempat terkendala pembebasan lahan tapi sudah hampir selesai ini. Program akan dilakukan pada 2020. Sementara kolam retenai Cieunteung dan Gedebage sudah bisa digunakan.
"Kolam retensi di Andir tahun sekarang baru pengadaan saja," ucap dia.
Diakuinya, saat ini penanganan genangan belum optimal karena kuncinya ada di floodway dan tunel. 
"Tapu sudah berkurang banyak kan ada Citarum Harum yang sudah membersihkan sampah di Citarum, " tutur dia.***

Galian Pillars of the Fast Train Can Affect the Greater Bandung Hydrological System
Nov 6, 2019, 05:13 by Novianti Nurulliah
BANDUNG, (PR) .- Galian pillars of the Jakarta Bandung Fast Train around the Greater Bandung will affect the hydrological system if the pillars are in the river body. The rest, if the construction of the pillar is not carried out in the river, it will not have any effect related to the potential for flooding or the extent of the possibility of inundation.
Head of BBWS Water Resources Implementation (PJSA) Citarum Suwarno said, the construction of the KCJB line in Greater Bandung indeed crosses two Citarum tributaries in Cimahi. The two rivers are Cigondewah and Cisangkan. In addition there is also a buried drainage channel. His side has been visited by KCIC, they asked for technical recommendations related to the excavation of the pillars in the two rivers and related to the drainage.
"Indeed, in the field there are unexplored galiang, drainage lines are still buried, I have asked the KCIC executive to tidy up immediately because it is now the rainy season, so that the flood does not pool to the north of the Padaleunyi toll road," Suwarno said who was contacted by "PR" , Wednesday, November 6 2019.
According to him, the KCIC in this case as the implementation of the KCJB project must move the river flow so that the water mold is not disturbed because of the accumulation of soil that is blocking the running of the water.
"They asked for technical advice on Thursday, recommendations from BBWS, about the conditions. And for the river channel diversion and drainage transition we asked immediately. In the field there are parts that have been implemented but not disturbed (water way). But about the closed drainage. I ask to be cleaned and normalized so that there are no puddles, "he said.
Aside from Cimahi, he said, the KCJB line also crosses the Gedebage area but does not disturb the river, there will be a bridge there.
The rest, related to the progress of the Bandung Raya flood management infrastructure project, BBWS claims that there have been many developments in the field. Among these are the construction of the Nanjung tunnels or tunnels, the handling of the Upper Citarum which includes the normalization of Cikeruh, Cimande, Cikijing, floodway or sodetan as well as retention ponds.
"Tunnel Nanjung is 92 percent, the end of November is complete. Casting in tunel is already 40 meters from 230 meters. Yes, one is already 230 meters. We have finished lining the tunnel," he said.
Then at the outlet in the first sediment trap section the cliff to the right of the same floor is finished.
"The door hole is already left, the bridge door has already been casted. The access road has also been done, yes, the tidings. Hopefully November is finished," he said.
For floodway or sodetan, he admitted that he had been hampered by land acquisition but it was almost finished. The program will be carried out in 2020. While Cieunteung and Gedebage retention ponds can be used.
"The retention pool at Andir this year has only been procured," he said.
He admitted, currently the handling of inundation was not optimal because the key was in the floodway and tunel.
"Tapu has been reduced a lot right there is a Fragrant Citarum that has cleaned up trash in Citarum," he said. ***
